page.title: 17FACTORIES IN SINFIN.
page.content: There are five main factories in Sinfin. They are Qualcast, Raleigh, Reckitt, NEI International Combustion, and Rolls-Royce. Rolls-Royce is the biggest and most important factory in Sinfin. They make engines for aeroplanes that are used all over the world. There are more Rolls-Royce factories around Derby. Raleigh isn't far from our school. I sometimes go past the factory and see the bicycles that have been made there and the big long delivery lorries. At Reckitts they make shampoo, disinfectants and other cosmetics. International Combustion make parts for power stations it is also a very large factory. At Qualcast they make lawn mowers. They are the biggest makers of lawn mowers in Britain. By Martyn.
